# Sample Project Specification

## Project Name
Sample Project

## Description
A sample project for testing Factory's specification handling.

## Target Users
- Developers
- Technical leads

## Core Features
1. User authentication
2. Data management
3. Reporting dashboard

## Technical Constraints
- Language: Go
- Database: PostgreSQL
- Deployment: Docker

## Success Criteria
- All tests passing
- Documentation complete
- Performance benchmarks met
